text: As we are seeing a surge in #COVID19 cases and the news talks about #COVIDSecondWave ..we appeal to you all to follow the protocols.. #MaskUp #SocialDistancing #Hygiene #vaccine let's work to curb this second wave ..#LargestVaccinationDrive is go get your shots @DrUshaSriram https://t.co/YuLD4AwuqZ
